sections.title: Field Agent (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Field Agent class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Field Agent)
sections.description: Field agents gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Field Agent Training (Field Agent)
sections.description: Field agents select special training options at 3rd level and every 3 levels thereafter, providing various abilities like wild empathy, sneak attack, or skill bonuses.

sections.title: Wayfinder Upgrade (Field Agent)
sections.description: Field agents can add special abilities to their wayfinder at 1st level and every 3 levels thereafter, such as spell-like abilities or hidden compartments.

sections.title: Bonus Feat (Field Agent)
sections.description: Field agents gain bonus feats at 2nd level and every 3 levels thereafter, limited to Skill Focus or teamwork feats.

sections.title: Legends Uncovered (Su) (Field Agent)
sections.description: At 10th level, field agents can research ancient subjects once per day as if casting legend lore.
